info: Rating, 4 stars,  · April 2024
rating_comment:
Had a pleasant stay. Convenient to find, hassle free check in since there was no formality to be filled up, well cleaned and maintained room and bathroom, very helpful people.
However, there were few issues which need to be addressed by the hosts. Firstly, the Wifi is very very slow, not even allowing proper WA calls, leave aside video calls or video streaming. While it was unfortunate that there was some nationwide internet issue due to some deep sea cable fault, but this was resolved within first 2 days, since I could use good wifi in other places from the 3rd day but not in this place. Secondly, guests inside the room will not know when the ladies come in the morning to clean the place. In the entire 5 nights stay, my room was cleaned and the linen were changed only for 1 day, that also after i informed the gatekeeper to call me the next day morning when the lady comes. Otherwise, they are not bothered even to knock and ask whether the room needs to be cleaned.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Great location, close to everywhere. Host is very good in communication.
As it’s a shared flat, need to consider other members sometimes be noisy and not considerate. Also front room is close to Road , so noises until mid night and car and horn noise from 6am.
I stayed 2 times, 1st time was absolutely great with all in tiptop
Condition, 2nd time there was lack of attention- small cockroaches at room and toilet, hair at room.
Very good amenities in the room and toilet, if you can add toothpaste and soap/wash gel that would be great!
In general, my staying was okay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: It was a great stay at Sayra’s place , easy to find, great location, and house is clean. If you can add toothpaste and a soap in the toilet , it will be very useful after after long travel and nothing around in the night. I will back to this place next week , thanks

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Location is good. Hridoy and Ashik remains helpful as ever. A multiplug and extra pair of bed sheet might help staying for few days. Dryer might help a bit after washing clothes. Apart from that, staying was wonderful.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2023
rating_comment: its a great place to stay at this cost. Manager was very helpful and friendly and the room perfectly matched the description. Had a very pleasant stay

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · August 2023
rating_comment:
Overall, my experience at Sayra's place was positive, with the exception of the intrusive traffic noise. The room was spacious ,clean and tastefully decorated. The host was friendly and accommodating, providing excellent service throughout my stay. The hotel's location was quite convenient, with easy access to nearby attractions, restaurants, and public transportation.
I would certainly consider staying there again if I were to visit the area, but I would request a quieter room option or inquire about potential noise-reduction measures to ensure a more peaceful stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
I booked the entire apartment. I loved it. I had no problem at all. Ashik helped me with everything. He is a great host. Very reasonable and respectful. I stayed for 30days and it was amazing. Surely coming back and I highly recommend this place.
Thank you team Sayra.
